titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, e16275: Amulet or phylactery

notesStmt.note: Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Straight out margins and evidence of many horizontal folds; written on one side only.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection. Found May 1932 with E 16280. Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
